casebody.data:

v.
Willie Lee PINKNEY, Clara Pinkney, Siddco, Inc., Poore Substitute Trustee, Ltd, Defendants. No. COA15-797. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. May 10, 2016.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
